items.title: Limit to colors for use on light or dark backgrounds?
items.body: Is there a way to limit the colors to only those that would be clearly visible on either light or dark backgrounds - depending on what theme a user chooses for a website?

items.title: color-hash.d.ts
Can I always use white text with these colors?
items.body:
The colors I've tested are safe to use with white text on. I guess these colors always have some grade of darkness/colors in them to make white text work on them. For example bright yellow and white will never be generated as colors?

Can you confirm that white text will always work with these colors?

items.title: Generates the same color for long strings of equal length
items.body:
It seems like it generates the same color for long strings if they have the same number of characters.

E.g.

```
long sentence abc
long sentence def
long sentence xyz
```

all generate the same color.

Any thoughts on this?

items.title: Hex string is too short
items.body:
When I use high saturation values the hex string becomes too short.

``` javascript
var colorHash = new ColorHash({saturation: 0.9});
colorHash.hex('test'); // #f252d
```

items.title: 所有的单字母都是同一个颜色差评。
当字符串很长时会超过 JavaScript 的数字限制
items.body: 要修改 BKDRHash 处理一下这个问题

items.title: remove fromPool
items.body:
- 实现太简单了，需要的人直接写个 hash 函数然后取余就好
- 给定列表需要非常大才能有效避免碰撞

items.title: 哈希结果太相近了
items.body:
# BF5F3F: hello wo
# BF593F: hello world
